root.name: Fret Nice
root.description: Fret Nice is a platforming game designed to be played with a Guitar Hero or Rock Band guitar controller, though a regular controller can also be used to play. This downloadable game will appear on the PlayStation Network and Xbox Live Arcade in 2010, with Tecmo set to handle publishing. Achievements/Trophies The achievement The Per Lundberg syndrome is named after Per Lundberg. A crazy swede, only 1.60m tall, and a good friend of Pieces Interactive. Per Lundberg is what you would call an achievement-whore. And therefor its a fitting name for one of the games more difficult achievements.

similar_games.game: Hi Hi Puffy AmiYumi: The Genie & the Amp
